apiDescription: An iterator over subslices separated by elements that match a predicate function, limited to a given number of splits.
This struct is created by the splitn_mut method on slices.

trait implementations.name: impl<'a, T, P> std::iter::Iterator for std::slice::SplitNMut<'a, T, P> where P: std::ops::FnMut(&T) -> bool
impl<'a, T, P> std::fmt::Debug for std::slice::SplitNMut<'a, T, P> where P: std::ops::FnMut(&T) -> bool, T: 'a + std::fmt::Debug
impl<'a, T, P> std::iter::FusedIterator for std::slice::SplitNMut<'a, T, P> where P: std::ops::FnMut(&T) -> bool
impl<'a, T, P> std::marker::Send for std::slice::SplitNMut<'a, T, P> where P: std::marker::Send, T: std::marker::Send
impl<'a, T, P> std::marker::Sync for std::slice::SplitNMut<'a, T, P> where P: std::marker::Sync, T: std::marker::Sync
